text: [Music]
I'm a good fan of a man called Chuck py
and if you haven't interviewed Chuck py
and he might not do an interview with
you but uh Chuck FY was a billionaire
who gave away all of his uh money and he
he he did
it he did it I I'll give you a little
example I I brought him on to see a
survival School for for the Irish
language and I was trying to encourage
him to give some money to it and when we
had finished uh he said to me this was
this was a school where parents had uh
financed by running Raffles
and you know all little sort of
fundraising projects and the kids were
all in this big this big Hall and they
were getting a brilliant education so he
said to me when we went through the
whole thing and I thought he was highly
impressed but he said I'm not going to
give them any
money and I said why not and he said
well they're doing very well without me
perhaps if I give them money they
wouldn't do as well so I would take a
Lea from his uh experience of
philanthropy and put it into
sustainable projects
[Music]
